]]></text></topic><topic position="333,54" order="2" id="5"><text><![CDATA[Globe Moving & Storage has been moving people for over 
47 years in Manitoba, with our two locations in Winnipeg 
and Brandon. Whether you have a small move or a big 
move, we understand that you are entrusting your 
possessions and furniture to our companyâ€™s hands. We 
believe in giving our best on every move. Our office 
personnel, drivers, and crews are fully trained and 
criminally background-checked, and our trucks and

Globe Moving & Storage is part of the Premiere Van Lines
